text: Oni sprashivayut tebya ob op'yanyayushchikh napitkakh i azartnykh igrakh. Skazhi: «V nikh yest' bol'shoy grekh, no yest' i pol'za dlya lyudey, khotya grekha v nikh bol'she, chem pol'zy». Oni sprashivayut tebya, chto oni dolzhny raskhodovat'. Skazhi: «Izlishek». Tak Allakh raz"yasnyayet vam znameniya, - byt' mozhet, vy porazmyslite
